content.en: Music recommendation algorithms: Algorithms play a crucial role in various aspects of music research and recommendation systems. They are used to measure similarity between music artists, help users find new music that matches their taste, and refine music recommendation systems based on scientific attributes of music tracks. Algorithms also analyze user preferences and incorporate audio features to enhance personalized recommendations. Additionally, algorithms are examined for their effects on music creators in streaming services and are evaluated for their ability to provide relevant recommendations to beyond-mainstream music listeners.
content.da: Musikanbefalingsalgoritmer: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i forskellige aspekter af musikforskning og anbefalingssystemer. De bruges til at måle lighed mellem musikartister, hjælpe brugere med at finde ny musik, der matcher deres smag, og forbedre musikanbefalingssystemer baseret på videnskabelige egenskaber af musiknumre. Algoritmer analyserer også brugerpræferencer og inkorporerer lydfunktioner for at forbedre personlige anbefalinger. Derudover undersøges algoritmer for deres indvirkning på musikskabere i streamingtjenester og vurderes for deres evne til at give relevante anbefalinger til lyttere af musik uden for mainstream.
